title: #92Noon! WhyDoWeCare?/Micheletti/Lavelle/Ramsey!
description: "Why do we care so much about our favorite teams?" is a question that dominates the first hour. Pat Micheletti in studio midway through, Lavelle joins on the crystal-clear Opal in the final hour, and the show wraps with Rachel Ramsey!
